mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Two Timin' Gal", "Yak Yak", "Beyond the Blue" and "Cotton Pickin' Polka Square" ROUND DANCES "Memories are Made of This" and "Lover's Waltz" SPECIAL FEATURES "You Can't Keep a Good Thing Down!", "The Silver Spur Award -II", "Caller Round up" and "Novel Cover Gives Challenge". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square Dance Picture", "Idea Corral: The Oriental Party", "On the Record: Looks at Books", "The Square of the Month", "Style Series: 'Cross Trail, Trail on Thru'", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
